game.name: Normality
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A sinister force now controls the city of Neutropolis. A once-thriving city full of beauty and light, Neutropolis has been reduced to a a stagnant pit of apathy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A sinister force now controls the city of Neutropolis. A once-thriving city full of beauty and light, Neutropolis has been reduced to a a stagnant pit of apathy.

reviewHighlights.text: When you launch it, it starts a new game that immediately overwrites your autosave. Sucks to be you if you got all the way through the first part and...
The puzzle that is literally just throwing dog shit at someone's face is is probnably the hardest ive laughed at a videogame in a while.
